has research problem.from sentence: CODAH : An Adversarially - Authored Question Answering Dataset for Common Sense
Commonsense reasoning is a critical AI capability , but it is difficult to construct challenging datasets that test commonsense .
The rise of datadriven methods has led to interest in developing large datasets for commonsense reasoning over text .
In this work , we introduce the COmmonsense Dataset Adversarially - authored by Humans ( CODAH ) for commonsense question answering in the style of SWAG multiple choice sentence completion .
